about_the_game:
Get insight into the story of Mikey, a teenager who is institutionalized by his mother for psychotherapy group treatment. Mikey has never been able to get over the tragedy and come to terms with his sad fate. Abandoned by everyone, he encounters unexplained events and supernatural phenomena, learns the secrets of this place and its inhabitants - as abandoned and lonely as himself.

The director of the institution and the psychotherapist talk about rebirth, lure him to the World of the Red Sun and keep silent about the missing children... and Mikey discovers new abilities and begins to change....

It's up to you to decide which path the hero will take.

One will lead him to the fulfillment of his dreams.

Another will destroy the lives of everyone he cares about.

The third will change the world forever.

Or destroy it.

Who will survive? Who will die? To stay or to go?

Get ready for...

  • Dynamic plot, full of interactivity from the first frames. Feel the atmosphere of the mystical world and control the events of the story. Almost all player's choices affect the plot;

  • Light narrative style, lots of jokes, black humor and references. Serious topics are brought up, but the plot is not overloaded;

  • Lively animations and musical accompaniment for total immersion;

  • The story has multiple branching paths and 13 endings;

  • Secret scene after completing all endings;

  • 15 characters, including monsters, over 30 backgrounds generated by neural network and finalized by hand;

  • Quick-time events;

  • Screamers;

  • A script of over 45,000 words. The walkthrough takes an average of 3-4 hours to complete.

__
Does not contain romantic routes, but it is possible to build a relationship with a character in one of the branches (not required to pass the game).
__
The game is developed by one enthusiast with no prior development experience. This is the first project, a lot of effort and time has been invested in it. Emphasis is placed on story dynamics and interactivity. I hope the novel will find a response in your heart! Have a nice walkthrough, everyone.
